summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in West Palm Beach regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case, offering to provide information about the case resolution and free legal representation for civil claims against Epstein. The email appears to be directed at a potential victim or claimant.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prosecuted case mentioned in the email.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The prosecutor of the Jeffrey Epstein case in West Palm Beach who is writing to provide case resolution information and connect the recipient with free legal representation for civil claims.

connections.description: The Assistant U.S. Attorney prosecuted the Jeffrey Epstein case in West Palm Beach.

events.title: Resolution of Epstein Case
events.description: The Assistant U.S. Attorney references the resolution of the Jeffrey Epstein case and offers to provide information about it to the recipient.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in West Palm Beach prosecuted the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The prosecutor is reaching out to provide information about the case resolution to the email recipient.
The prosecutor offers to connect the recipient with an attorney for free legal representation regarding civil claims against Epstein.
The communication suggests the recipient may be a victim or potential claimant in the Epstein case.
The email is dated September 3, 2008, which is after Epstein's 2008 plea deal.
